Package interfaces

Interface IInventoryService

All Known Implementing Classes:
InventoryService
public interface IInventoryService
The IInventoryService interface defines the methods for managing the hospital's inventory, including adding, updating, and removing medications, as well as handling stock levels and replenishment requests.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • getInventoryList

      List<Inventory> getInventoryList()
      Retrieves the list of all inventory items.
      Returns:
      A list of Inventory objects representing the current inventory.

    • updateInventory

      void updateInventory(Inventory updatedInventory)
      Updates an existing inventory item.
      Parameters:
      updatedInventory - The updated Inventory object.

    • addMedication

      void addMedication(Inventory newMedication)
      Adds a new medication to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      newMedication - The new Inventory object representing the medication to be added.

    • removeMedication

      boolean removeMedication(String medicineName)
      Removes a medication from the inventory based on its name.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medication to be removed.
      Returns:
      True if the medication was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • updateStockLevel

      boolean updateStockLevel(String medicineName, int quantity)
      Updates the stock level for a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medication.
      quantity - The new stock quantity.
      Returns:
      True if the stock level was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • updateLowStockAlert

      boolean updateLowStockAlert(String medicineName, int lowStockLevel)
      Updates the low stock alert level for a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medication.
      lowStockLevel - The new low stock alert level.
      Returns:
      True if the low stock alert level was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • submitReplenishmentRequest

      void submitReplenishmentRequest()
      Submits a replenishment request for a specific medication.

    • approveReplenishmentRequest

      boolean approveReplenishmentRequest(String medicineName)
      Approves a replenishment request for a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medication for which the replenishment request is approved.
      Returns:
      True if the replenishment request was successfully approved, false otherwise.
